content: Certainly! One great podcast that focuses on indie games for the Switch is the "Nindies and Indies" podcast, hosted by two longtime Nintendo fans who are passionate about the console's indie scene. The podcast regularly features interviews with indie developers, reviews of new indie releases, and discussions about the evolving role of indie games in the gaming industry. They also cover Nintendo's indie-focused Directs and events, sharing their thoughts on the latest announcements and trailers.
